MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:28pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations are required on the electrical network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:05 PM on Wednesday, 06 January 2021.
